# Build artifacts cmake-build-debug/ build/ CMakeFiles/ CMakeCache.txt Makefile cmake_install.cmake Automated_Sorting_System.map Automated_Sorting_System.hex Automated_Sorting_System.bin Automated_Sorting_System.elf

# Mac .DS_Store

# STM32Cube generated files to ignore (if you want to keep them, remove these) *.ioc.user
# Python __pycache__/ *.pyc
# Other *.bak *.old
# Ignore K210/other model outputs kmodel/
